fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Turn into Diamond (272), Diamond (1469), Igu (267), Igu, Crystalline Seraph (2013) or Masochist (2431). Your choice which one.
-Call someone a wriggly flea, lowering their defense to Vulnerable.
-Be a degen and pick a target. You will redirect everyone away from that target. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If a wriggly flea survives 3 nights in a row after receiving Vulnerable Defense, **Unlock** and raise their defense back to what it was before they became a wriggly flea.
-(**Locked**) This role wins the game regardless of win condition fullfilments.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Igu cannot win the game, as she has won far too many.
